name: Pixel-Fire (Mock Company)
short_description:
This is mainly a project that I created myself to show a website for a small business and how it would work. It is a display of my web design skills.

However, the code here is available to all and can be downloaded and used as you like. Take this as an oppurtunity to see how some simple HTML5 and CSS can be thrown together to create a nice-looking result.
summary: This is a test run/example of a website I made, code is free to use.
